themes: transition planning for organizations/artists leaving funding
key_phrases: long-term, as in, in perpetuity (or at least for 2+ years)
passes a yearly evaluation of some sort
connect them with education to make their organizations/art practice more long-standing
development director of each org given long-term funding should be required to meet with a city personnel
create a long-term plan so that they're not left underfunded once their city funding runs out
help artists and art organizations become feasible long-term
barriers_identified: organizations/artists left underfunded after city funding ends
solutions_proposed: make funding long-term or in perpetuity, with annual evaluations
require development directors to meet with city personnel in their last year of funding to create long-term plans
provide education to help organizations and artists become sustainable after city funding ends
